DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine certain medication , alone combine another medication , increase muscle activity upper airway people people sleep apnea . The medication study paroxetine , commonly use antidepressant , 5 hydroxy-tryptophan ( 5HTP ) , also use dietary supplement without prescription . Because effect paroxetine previous study large , also study combine 5HTP see effect upper airway muscle great .
DOC.brief_title: Serotonin Upper Airway Obstructive Sleep Apnea
DOC.criteria: Group A : 20 Adult patient mild severe sleep apnea . If patient treat nasal CPAP , continue treatment except study night . Group B : 20 normal adult nonsnoring subject .
